thread.title: Sterling Price

author: Sterling Price
title: Sterling Price
text:
I failed to record the correct date of when my monthly charge was to be processed. As a result, I was charged an additional month that my client would not pay for. Shaun was very helpful and was able to refund me the money, as well as explain some other important details about how the site works. I am very thankful for his help and his professionalism.
I will definitely use Zip Recruiter in the future.
